content: You are good at finding the object in a 3D scene based on a given query description.

These images show different views of a room. You need to find the monitor in this query description: "this is a rectangular flat panel monitor. it is the last monitor on the right in the front row of monitors.". 
Please review all view images to find the target object and select the view that you can see the target object most clearly. 
Output your answer in JSON format with these keys: 
"reasoning": Explain how you identified the target object, and why you choose this view.
"view": The number of the view is in the top left corner of the corresponding image. e.g., "view": "2"

The target object is described as the last monitor on the right in the front row of monitors. In view 3, the arrangement of monitors is visible, and the front row can be clearly identified. The last monitor on the right in this row is visible in this view, making it the best choice to see the target object clearly.

Here is the annotated image of the selected view. 
All objects belonging to the monitor class is labeled by a unique number (ID) in red color on it.
Please select the object ID that best matches the given query description: "this is a rectangular flat panel monitor. it is the last monitor on the right in the front row of monitors.".
Carefully analyze the specified conditions (such as shape, color, relative position with surrounding objects) in the given query, then select top-5 best-matched object IDs.
The selected top-5 object IDs should be sorted in descending order of confidence.
The object ID should be chosen from this list [2, 3, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11, 16, 25, 28, 32, 35, 36, 42, 45, 53, 57, 58, 59, 83, 87, 103, 119]
Output your answer in JSON format with these keys: 
"reasoning": Explain how you identified and ranked the top-5 target object IDs.
"object_id": A list of5 selected target object IDs. e.g., [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]

The query describes a rectangular flat panel monitor that is the last on the right in the front row of monitors. The front row is the one closest to the bottom of the image. The monitor IDs in this row are 16, 36, 58, 119, 59, 11, 53, 57, 28, and 42. Among these, the last monitor on the right is ID 42. The top-5 IDs are ranked based on their proximity to the rightmost position in the front row.
